chapter.para: After you deploy your cluster you may want to install and use other software that is not shipped with &productname; by default. This chapter gives you detailed instructions how to deploy, for example, the &kube; dashboard and how to set up &kube; DNS for service discovery.

sect1.title: Deploying &helm; and &tiller;
sect1.para: &helm; charts provide a standard way to deploy &kube; applications. While the &helm;'s server-side component is not preinstalled on &productname;, it is possible to install it by enabling the appropriate option in the Velum graphical interface. When the Install &tiller; option is enabled, &tiller; is installed as a container on a &productname; 2 cluster from the installation media.

Once &tiller; is installed on &productname; 2 cluster, the &helm; client can be used to interact with &tiller; and the cluster. To initialize the &helm; client (which automatically discovers &tiller; in the cluster), run the helm init --client-only command. After that, you can use the &helm; client as described in the official documentation at .

note.title: &helm; and &tiller; are Optional
note.para: Both &helm; and &tiller; are optional, unless you plan to run run a &suse; Cloud Application Platform.
